description: THE BROS ARE BACK to try to stumble their way through a practice game of Combat Patrol before the Big Tourney.
title: Battle Bros Season Four Point Five, Chapter III: Well This Doesn’t Bode Well

description: One of the great joys of historical wargaming is the huge potential variety of scenarios, both balanced and extremely not that present themselves. In this respect, the single scenario in the main SAGA rulebook is, shall we say, slightly lacking. Enter the Book of Battles. At a slender, soft backed 55 pages (available for £16 […]
title: Variety is the Spice of SAGA: The Book of Battles

description: My first-ever wargaming convention, and still the one nearest and dearest to my heart, NoVa celebrated its thirteenth convention over Labor Day Weekend in 2024.  The 2023 convention was NoVa’s first at the Washington Hilton, and the first year had strong growing pains because while you can plan a great convention it does take a  […]
title: Contemptor Kevin and Salsa’s NoVA Open 2024 Recap

description: In this week's Hammer of Math we look at the value of re-rolls vs. modifiers and talk about when to fish for results.
title: Hammer of Math: Modifiers and Re-rolls in Tenth Edition Warhammer 40k
